attributes.action: Help students out more when it comes to funding careers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that the government should help students get out of education and into the job industry wether that is giving out small grants to students to get off the ground with a new idea for a business or if that is helping students more financially when it comes to accessing work within the first three/four months.

rejection.details:
Similar petitions already exist eg:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Work2Learn/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/helpforstudents/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
